headline: Is Analyst Downgrade and Data Center Delays Altering the Investment Case for Vistra (VST)?
summary: Following a recent analyst downgrade from Jefferies, Vistra experienced increased scrutiny due to concerns over its valuation, political uncertainty, and delays in key data center-related nuclear plant deals. An interesting detail highlighted by analysts is that unresolved progress on the Comanche Peak nuclear project and contract outcomes may have significant influence on Vistra's future prospects. We'll explore how the analyst downgrade and delayed data center projects may alter the...

headline: Nasdaq Futures Climb as Alibaba and Micron Boost AI Sentiment
summary: December Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQZ25) are trending up +0.30% this morning as optimism over artificial intelligence was reinforced by Alibaba’s pledge to boost spending and an upbeat forecast from Micron Technology.

headline: Jefferies lowers Vistra rating, sees stock pricing in full Comanche deal
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies downgraded Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) to “hold” from “buy,” cutting its price target to $230 a share from $241, citing delays in a nuclear contract tied to Comanche Peak and the stock’s steep run-up.
